column6: MOST DANGEROUS GAME PART 3 With one of the X-Men now a captive on the island of Krakoa, Mojo demands the X-Men return Longshot to his headquarters or Angel will soon have a harp to go with his wings.
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
